local_intent: Ensure t_block is perceived, realign if needed, set the TCP yaw to 90°, then verify orientation at 90°.
coherence_with_global: Matches GLOBAL_BT by performing perception (IsObjectVisible/ScanForTarget), alignment (ApproachAndAlign with retry), action (SetTCPYaw 90), and verification (AtOrientation 90) before subsequent push strokes.
